entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • GenerateDepsFile doesn't include file or assembly version for Project references #12301
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 Preview 5, Creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM requires July Servicing (8.0.7/6.0.32) feeds. #41432

Updated

  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Info produced by `dotnet -?` about `dotnet help` is inaccurate. It says the command "Show command line help" rather than show online documentation in browser #41173

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix compressed endpoint headers #41511
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Dispose FileStream after reading it and calculating Fingerprint & Integrity #41508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable CET compatibility setting on apphost when `CetCompat` property is set to `false` #41483
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Blazor] Ensure development manifest resolves tokens #41498
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Revert TestPackage creation changes #41451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Respect DebugSymbols=false Fixes #41364 #41384
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-NetSDK, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Specify a version of cmake in global.json #41476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/roslyn/0001-ambiguous-call-site.patch #41089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
